controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-management systems to determine whether a customer or beneficial owner is a politically exposed person?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-management systems for PEP determination

controls.label: Do you undertake PEP determination before providing a designated service or as soon as practicable after provision?
For domestic PEPs and international organisation PEPs, does your program comply with identification requirements (paragraphs 4.2.3 to 4.2.9) as if the PEP was the customer?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you apply standard CID identification procedures to PEPs

controls.label: Do you determine whether domestic PEPs and international organisation PEPs are of high ML/TF risk?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk assessment methodology for these PEP categories

controls.label: Is this customer or beneficial owner a domestic PEP or international organisation PEP determined to be of high ML/TF risk?
For foreign PEPs or high ML/TF risk domestic or international organisation PEPs, does your program comply with identification requirements (paragraphs 4.2.3 to 4.2.9) as if the PEP was the customer?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you apply standard CID identification procedures to these PEP categories

controls.label: Do you obtain senior management approval before establishing or continuing a business relationship with foreign PEPs or high ML/TF risk PEPs?
controls.detail-label: Describe your senior management approval process and documentation

controls.label: Do you take reasonable measures to establish the source of wealth and source of funds for foreign PEPs or high ML/TF risk PEPs?
controls.detail-label: Describe the reasonable measures you take to verify source of wealth and funds

controls.label: Do you comply with the transaction monitoring and ongoing reporting obligations in Chapter 15 for foreign PEPs or high ML/TF risk PEPs?
Does your AML/CTF program include appropriate risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies that arise during PEP information verification?
controls.detail-label: Describe your discrepancy handling procedures for PEP verification

controls.label: Are you able to be reasonably satisfied that the PEP is the person they claim to be after responding to verification discrepancies?

groups.title: PEP Determination
groups.description: Risk management systems to identify whether a customer or beneficial owner is a PEP, before or as soon as practicable after providing a designated service.

groups.title: Domestic and International Organisation PEP Procedures
groups.description: Procedures for domestic PEPs and international organisation PEPs, including identification, risk assessment, and enhanced measures for high ML/TF risk cases.

groups.title: Foreign and High ML/TF Risk PEP Procedures
groups.description: Enhanced procedures for foreign PEPs and high ML/TF risk domestic or international organisation PEPs, including senior management approval, source of wealth/funds verification, and transaction monitoring obligations.

groups.title: PEP Verification and Discrepancy Handling
groups.description: Risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies arising during PEP information verification.
